item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Reaction to Michael Vick signing by Philadelphia Eagles spans commerce, protest
item.description: The swift wave of commerce was in full motion in reaction to the Philadelphia Eagles' signing of Michael Vick's.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: PGA Championship: Tiger Woods seizes firm control with 2-under 70
item.description: Tiger Woods has a four-stroke lead midway through the PGA Championship after a 2-under 70 on Friday at Hazeltine National.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Denver Broncos wide receiver Brandon Marshall found not guilty in battery case
item.description: A jury in Atlanta has found Denver Broncos wide receiver Brandon Marshall not guilty of misdemeanor battery.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: College football teams plan pregame handshakes for first week
item.description: College football teams are planning to start the season off on a courteous note.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Wisconsin Badgers suspend Aubrey Pleasant, Shane Carter
item.description: Wisconsin has suspended safeties Aubrey Pleasant and Shane Carter.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Usain Bolt, Tyson Gay cruise into second round of 100 meters at world championships
item.description: Usain Bolt and Tyson Gay cruised into the second round of the 100 meters at the world championships, keeping on track for a showdown in the final.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Sanchez engineers TD drive; Jets fall to Rams
item.description: Mark Sanchez completed a 48-yard pass to David Clowney on his first NFL play, and the Jets rookie engineered an early scoring drive in New York's 23-20 loss to the St. Louis Rams on Friday night.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Orton's 3 INTs accent disastrous Denver debut
item.description: Kyle Orton threw interceptions in his first three series during a disastrous Denver debut, while San Francisco's two quarterback candidates were steady in the 49ers' 17-16 victory over the Broncos on Friday night.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: West Virginia's Oakhurst Links course, America's oldest, up for sale
item.description: The birthplace of American golf is up for sale.

item.dc:creator: External
item.title: ESPN reaches deal to offer EPL in UK, Ireland

item.dc:creator: Chad Millman
item.title: Pro sports leagues granted hearing to stop Delaware sports betting
item.description: An appeals court ruling gives leagues last chance to halt sports betting before Sept. 1

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Rogers Cup: Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal ousted in quarterfinals
item.description: Andy Murray has ended Nikolay Davydenko's 12-match winning streak with a 6-2, 6-4 victory in the quarterfinals of the Rogers Cup.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Martinez double sparks BoSox rally by Rangers
item.description: - Victor Martinez's two-run double keyed a six-run ninth inning that lifted the Boston Red Sox to an 8-4 victory over the Texas Rangers on Friday night, preserving their lead in the AL wild card.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Michael Phelps uninjured after two-car accident; police say other driver at fault
item.description: Baltimore police say the other driver was at fault in a crash involving Olympic champion Michael Phelps.

item.dc:creator: Paul Kuharsky
item.title: Jacksonville Jaguars first-round pick Eugene Monroe agrees to five-year deal
item.description: The Jaguars and first-round pick Eugene Monroe have come to terms on a five-year deal, according to The Florida Times-Union.
